sysevent_email_template.message_html:
Hello,

This is an automatic message to inform you your telephone request has been created.

Number: ${number}

Requested by: ${u_requested_by}

Requested for: ${requested_for}

Manager: ${u_manager}

State: ${state}

Due date: ${due_date}
sysevent_email_template.name: telephone.request.created
sysevent_email_template.subject: Telephone Request Created: ${number}
